name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proactive Senior Platform Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **CI/CD**, **performance optimization**, and **cross-functional communication**. My expertise includes high-level programming with **Go**, **Rust**, **C++**, and **Scala**, alongside a profound understanding of **blockchain** technologies, including **Solidity** and **Merkle trees**. I have successfully led the development of internal tooling that enhances developer experience while ensuring robust observability and compliance within systems.

I also bring hands-on experience in **microservices architecture** and building high-performance solutions across diverse sectors, utilizing my skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**. With expertise in leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I have contributed to enterprise-grade platforms, incorporating **AI/ML** capabilities for advanced analytics and intelligent automation. My deep cloud experience spans platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS**, where I implement robust and secure applications aligning with compliance standards. Additionally, my knowledge of machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** enhances my contributions to project success.
